#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <algorithm>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
	int t;
	int n, k;
	string s;
	char c, p;
	cin >> t;

	while (t--) {
		cin >> n >> k;
		getchar();
		int tot = 0;
		int cr = 1;
		bool flag = false;
		scanf("%c", &p);
		for (int i = 1; i < n; i++) {
			scanf("%c", &c);
			if (c != p) {
				if (cr >= k) {
					flag = true;
					tot += (cr + k - 1) / k;
				}
				else {
					tot++;
				}
				cr = 1;
			}
			else {
				cr++;
			}
			p = c;
			//cout << "\t" << c << " cnt = " << cr << endl;
		}
		if (cr >= k) {
			flag = true;
			tot += (cr + k - 1) / k;
		}
		else {
			tot++;
		}
		if (n == 1) {
			cout << "1" << endl;
		}
		else if (flag) {
			cout << tot << endl;
		}
		else {
			cout << "-1" << endl;
		}
	}

	return 0;
}
